verses.verse: And it came to pass in the <S%H8147>twelfth<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%>, in the twelfth <S%H2320>month<s%>, in the <S%H259>first<s%> day of the <S%H2320>month<s%>, that the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> came unto <S%H559>me<s%>, saying,

<S%H1121>Son<s%> of <S%H120>man<s%>, take <S%H5375>up<s%> a <S%H7015>lamentation<s%> for <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>, and <S%H559>say<s%> unto <S%H1819>him<s%>, You are like a young <S%H3715>lion<s%> of the <S%H1471>nations<s%>, and you are as a <S%H8577>whale<s%> in the <S%H3220>seas<s%>: and you came <S%H1518>forth<s%> with your <S%H5104>rivers<s%>, and <S%H1804>troubled<s%> the <S%H4325>waters<s%> with your <S%H7272>feet<s%>, and <S%H7515>fouled<s%> their <S%H5104>rivers<s%>.

Thus <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>God<s%>; I will therefore spread <S%H6566>out<s%> my <S%H7568>net<s%> over you with a <S%H6951>company<s%> of <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H5971>people<s%>; and they shall bring you <S%H5927>up<s%> in my <S%H2764>net<s%>.

Then will I <S%H5203>leave<s%> you upon the <S%H776>land<s%>, I will cast you <S%H2904>forth<s%> upon the <S%H6440>open<s%> <S%H7704>field<s%>, and will cause all the <S%H5775>birds<s%> of the <S%H8064>heaven<s%> to <S%H7931>remain<s%> upon <S%H7646>you<s%>, and I will fill the <S%H2416>animals<s%> of the whole earth with <S%H776>you<s%>.
And I will <S%H5414>lay<s%> your <S%H1320>flesh<s%> upon the <S%H2022>mountains<s%>, and <S%H4390>fill<s%> the <S%H1516>valleys<s%> with your <S%H7419>height<s%>.

I will also <S%H8248>water<s%> with your <S%H1818>blood<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> where you <S%H6824>swim<s%>, even to the <S%H2022>mountains<s%>; and the <S%H650>rivers<s%> shall be full of <S%H4390>you<s%>.

And when I shall put you <S%H3518>out<s%>, I will <S%H3680>cover<s%> the <S%H8064>heaven<s%>, and <S%H6937>make<s%> the <S%H3556>stars<s%> there <S%H6937>dark<s%>; I will <S%H3680>cover<s%> the <S%H8121>sun<s%> with a <S%H6051>cloud<s%>, and the <S%H3394>moon<s%> shall not <S%H215>give<s%> her <S%H216>light<s%>.

All the <S%H3974>bright<s%> <S%H216>lights<s%> of <S%H8064>heaven<s%> will I make <S%H6937>dark<s%> over <S%H5414>you<s%>, and set <S%H2822>darkness<s%> upon your <S%H776>land<s%>, <S%H5002>says<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>God<s%>.

I will also <S%H3707>trouble<s%> the <S%H3820>hearts<s%> of <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H5971>people<s%>, when I shall <S%H935>bring<s%> your <S%H7667>destruction<s%> among the <S%H1471>nations<s%>, into the <S%H776>countries<s%> which you have not <S%H3045>known<s%>.

<S%H7227>Yes<s%>, I will make many <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H8074>amazed<s%> at <S%H4428>you<s%>, and their kings shall be <S%H8178>horribly<s%> <S%H8175>afraid<s%> for <S%H5774>you<s%>, when I shall brandish my <S%H2719>sword<s%> before <S%H6440>them<s%>; and they shall <S%H2729>tremble<s%> at every <S%H7281>moment<s%>, every <S%H376>man<s%> for his own <S%H5315>life<s%>, in the <S%H3117>day<s%> of your <S%H4658>fall<s%>.
For thus <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>God<s%>; The <S%H2719>sword<s%> of the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon<s%> shall come upon <S%H935>you<s%>.

By the <S%H2719>swords<s%> of the <S%H1368>mighty<s%> will I cause your <S%H1995>multitude<s%> to <S%H5307>fall<s%>, the <S%H6184>terrible<s%> of the <S%H1471>nations<s%>, all of <S%H7703>them<s%>: and they shall plunder the <S%H1347>pomp<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>, and all the <S%H1995>multitude<s%> there shall be <S%H8045>destroyed<s%>.

I will <S%H6>destroy<s%> also all the <S%H929>animals<s%> there <S%H5921>from<s%> beside the <S%H7227>great<s%> <S%H4325>waters<s%>; neither shall the <S%H7272>foot<s%> of <S%H120>man<s%> <S%H1804>trouble<s%> them any <S%H6541>more<s%>, nor the hoofs of <S%H929>animals<s%> trouble <S%H1804>them<s%>.
Then will I make their <S%H4325>waters<s%> <S%H8257>deep<s%>, and cause their <S%H5104>rivers<s%> to <S%H3212>run<s%> like <S%H8081>oil<s%>, <S%H5002>says<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>God<s%>.

When I shall <S%H5414>make<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> <S%H8077>desolate<s%>, and the <S%H776>country<s%> shall be <S%H8074>destitute<s%> of that whereof it was <S%H4393>full<s%>, when I shall <S%H5221>strike<s%> all them that <S%H3427>live<s%> in <S%H3045>it<s%>, then shall they know that I am the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>.

This is the <S%H7015>lamentation<s%> with which they shall <S%H6969>lament<s%> <S%H1323>her<s%>: the daughters of the <S%H1471>nations<s%> shall <S%H6969>lament<s%> <S%H6969>her<s%>: they shall lament for <S%H4714>her<s%>, even for Egypt, and for all her <S%H1995>multitude<s%>, <S%H5002>says<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>God<s%>.

It came to pass also in the <S%H8147>twelfth<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%>, in the <S%H2568>fifteenth<s%> day of the <S%H2320>month<s%>, that the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> came unto <S%H559>me<s%>, saying,

<S%H1121>Son<s%> of <S%H120>man<s%>, <S%H5091>wail<s%> for the <S%H1995>multitude<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>, and cast them <S%H3381>down<s%>, even <S%H1323>her<s%>, and the daughters of the <S%H117>famous<s%> <S%H1471>nations<s%>, unto the nether <S%H8482>parts<s%> of the <S%H776>earth<s%>, with them that go <S%H3381>down<s%> into the <S%H953>pit<s%>.
Whom do you pass in <S%H5276>beauty<s%>? go <S%H3381>down<s%>, and be you <S%H7901>laid<s%> with the <S%H6189>uncircumcised<s%>.

They shall <S%H5307>fall<s%> in the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of them that are <S%H2491>slain<s%> by the <S%H2719>sword<s%>: she is <S%H5414>delivered<s%> to the <S%H2719>sword<s%>: <S%H4900>draw<s%> her and all her <S%H1995>multitudes<s%>.

The <S%H410>strong<s%> among the <S%H1368>mighty<s%> shall <S%H1696>speak<s%> to him out of the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of <S%H7585>hell<s%> with them that <S%H5826>help<s%> <S%H3381>him<s%>: they are gone down, they <S%H7901>lie<s%> <S%H6189>uncircumcised<s%>, <S%H2491>slain<s%> by the <S%H2719>sword<s%>.
<S%H804>Asshur<s%> is there and all her <S%H6951>company<s%>: his <S%H6913>graves<s%> are <S%H5439>about<s%> <S%H2491>him<s%>: all of them slain, <S%H5307>fallen<s%> by the <S%H2719>sword<s%>:

Whose <S%H6913>graves<s%> are <S%H5414>set<s%> in the <S%H3411>sides<s%> of the <S%H953>pit<s%>, and her <S%H6951>company<s%> is round <S%H5439>about<s%> her <S%H6900>grave<s%>: all of them <S%H2491>slain<s%>, <S%H5307>fallen<s%> by the <S%H2719>sword<s%>, which <S%H5414>caused<s%> <S%H2851>terror<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of the <S%H2416>living<s%>.

There is <S%H5867>Elam<s%> and all her <S%H1995>multitude<s%> round <S%H5439>about<s%> her <S%H6900>grave<s%>, all of them <S%H2491>slain<s%>, <S%H5307>fallen<s%> by the <S%H2719>sword<s%>, which are gone <S%H3381>down<s%> <S%H6189>uncircumcised<s%> into the nether <S%H8482>parts<s%> of the <S%H776>earth<s%>, which <S%H5414>caused<s%> their <S%H2851>terror<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of the <S%H2416>living<s%>; yet have they <S%H5375>borne<s%> their <S%H3639>shame<s%> with them that go <S%H3381>down<s%> to the <S%H953>pit<s%>.

They have <S%H5414>set<s%> her a <S%H4904>bed<s%> in the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of the <S%H2491>slain<s%> with all her <S%H1995>multitude<s%>: her <S%H6913>graves<s%> are round <S%H5439>about<s%> <S%H6189>him<s%>: all of them uncircumcised, <S%H2491>slain<s%> by the <S%H2719>sword<s%>: though their <S%H2851>terror<s%> was <S%H5414>caused<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of the <S%H2416>living<s%>, yet have they <S%H5375>borne<s%> their <S%H3639>shame<s%> with them that go <S%H3381>down<s%> to the <S%H953>pit<s%>: he is <S%H5414>put<s%> in the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of them that be <S%H2491>slain<s%>.

There is <S%H4902>Meshech<s%>, <S%H8422>Tubal<s%>, and all her <S%H1995>multitude<s%>: her <S%H6913>graves<s%> are round <S%H5439>about<s%> <S%H6189>him<s%>: all of them uncircumcised, <S%H2490>slain<s%> by the <S%H2719>sword<s%>, though they <S%H5414>caused<s%> their <S%H2851>terror<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of the <S%H2416>living<s%>.

And they shall not <S%H7901>lie<s%> with the <S%H1368>mighty<s%> that are <S%H5307>fallen<s%> of the <S%H6189>uncircumcised<s%>, which are gone <S%H3381>down<s%> to <S%H7585>hell<s%> with their <S%H3627>weapons<s%> of <S%H4421>war<s%>: and they have <S%H5414>laid<s%> their <S%H2719>swords<s%> under their <S%H7218>heads<s%>, but their <S%H5771>iniquities<s%> shall be upon their <S%H6106>bones<s%>, though they were the <S%H2851>terror<s%> of the <S%H1368>mighty<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of the <S%H2416>living<s%>.
<S%H7665>Yes<s%>, you shall be broken in the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of the <S%H6189>uncircumcised<s%>, and shall <S%H7901>lie<s%> with them that are <S%H2491>slain<s%> with the <S%H2719>sword<s%>.

There is <S%H123>Edom<s%>, her <S%H4428>kings<s%>, and all her <S%H5387>princes<s%>, which with their <S%H1369>might<s%> are <S%H5414>laid<s%> by them that were <S%H2491>slain<s%> by the <S%H2719>sword<s%>: they shall <S%H7901>lie<s%> with the <S%H6189>uncircumcised<s%>, and with them that go <S%H3381>down<s%> to the <S%H953>pit<s%>.

There be the <S%H5257>princes<s%> of the <S%H6828>north<s%>, all of <S%H6722>them<s%>, and all the Zidonians, which are gone <S%H3381>down<s%> with the <S%H2491>slain<s%>; with their <S%H2851>terror<s%> they are <S%H954>ashamed<s%> of their <S%H1369>might<s%>; and they <S%H7901>lie<s%> <S%H6189>uncircumcised<s%> with them that be <S%H2491>slain<s%> by the <S%H2719>sword<s%>, and <S%H5375>bear<s%> their <S%H3639>shame<s%> with them that go <S%H3381>down<s%> to the <S%H953>pit<s%>.

<S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> shall <S%H7200>see<s%> <S%H5162>them<s%>, and shall be comforted over all his <S%H1995>multitude<s%>, even <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> and all his <S%H2428>army<s%> <S%H2491>slain<s%> by the <S%H2719>sword<s%>, <S%H5002>says<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>God<s%>.

For I have <S%H5414>caused<s%> my <S%H2851>terror<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of the <S%H2416>living<s%>: and he shall be <S%H7901>laid<s%> in the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of the <S%H6189>uncircumcised<s%> with them that are <S%H2491>slain<s%> with the <S%H2719>sword<s%>, even <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> and all his <S%H1995>multitude<s%>, <S%H5002>says<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>God<s%>.
